content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you set up an appointment for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs. May I have your first name, please?
Uh, hi, yeah, sure… it’s Mike.
Thank you, Mike! Can you please share the address where you need plumbing services?
Got it, thanks! What plumbing issue are you experiencing today, Mike?
Uh, the kitchen sink won’t drain, tried to use the plunger, didn’t work. Not really sure what’s up.
Thank you for the details. When would you ideally like us to come by to take a look at your kitchen sink?
Oh shoot, wait, I just realized I have to leave soon for another appointment. Uh, let me get back to you later, sorry!
reason: Customer remembered another appointment and could not continue scheduling.
